I think that I know what was causing this.  I was extending the
ProblemsLabelDecorator and having the state default to true for the
decorators extension point.  It looks as though ProblemsLabelDecorator tries
to be lightweight or heavyweight depending on certain circumstances and
therefore is not always UI thread-safe.  I decided not to be lazy and implement
my own label decorator that does the same things as ProblemsLabelDecorator but
is actually always lightweight; I only needed it for the IResource decoration
behavior anyway.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 36554 ***
